Opower is hiring on our Infrastructure Team! Locations: SF and VA - www.opower.com/careers

Who is Opower? We’re a technology company that uses data management, insightful analytics, and behavioral science to transform the way utilities relate to their customers. And our impact so far – terawatt hours of energy and millions of dollars saved – is huge.

We are hiring a handful of roles on this team. I am looking for a security engineer (VA) , systems engineer (SF) and a DBA (SF).

All of these roles are listed on our careers page, but please don't hesitate to email me at heather.cassano@opower.com for more information!
